about__me: Hey, it's me Akash N O. I am just trying to find things that will make me love living and that's how I found my craze with computers. I am currently working on mastering backend web development with python and the beautiful Django framework. It's not like my hands are 24/7 on the keyboard, Hanging out with friends and playing sports are also my thing.
